densityOfGaussian

public static double densityOfGaussian(Point x,
                                       PVector param)
Computes the density value \f$ f(x;\mu,\sigma^2) \f$.

Parameters:
x - point
param - parameters (source, natural, or expectation)
Returns:
\f$ f(x;\mu,\sigma^2) = \frac{1}{ \sqrt{2\pi \sigma^2} } \exp \left( - \frac{(x-\mu)^2}{ 2 \sigma^2} \right) \f$

Returns:
a point
